sentence.Network_en: Many dolphins are accidentally killed through entanglement with fishing equipment.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多海豚因为被渔具缠住而意外死亡。

sentence.Network_en: Many dolphins die each year from entanglement in fishing nets.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年都有许多海豚被捕鱼网缠绕致死。

sentence.Network_en: This entanglement made Carrie anxious for a change of some sort.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种纠葛弄得嘉莉急于改变一下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “纠缠”（Entanglement）一词（德文的和英文的）是多才多艺的量子力学创始人之一Erwin Schrodinger（1887－1961）于1926年发明 …
他们让两个光子产生纠结(entanglement)，然后使其中一颗光子的性质，瞬间在空间中另一端的光子身上重现，如此从旁观者眼中看来…
缠结(entanglement)：高分子链之间相互缠绕、穿透的现象。缠结点(entanglement point)：缠结中的分子链相互限制侧向运动的作用 …
...量子力学的非定域性主要表现为一个十分奇特的现象——量子纠缠(entanglement),即在一个量子系统的两个远距离部分之间的存在关 …

list.abs: 高分子的链缠结(chain entanglement)是高分子凝聚态物理中基本问题。缠结如何进行定量化描述是高分子缠结研究中一个重要问题。高分子链只有通过相互穿插的方式形成“.

entry.tran: 复杂关系（或情况）；纠葛;瓜葛
entry.def: An entanglement is a complicated or difficult relationship or situation.

example.ex: ...a military and political entanglement the Government probably doesn't want.
example.tran: 政府可能并不想看到的军政之间的纠葛

entry.def: If things become entangled, you can refer to this as entanglement .

example.ex: Many dolphins are accidentally killed through entanglement with fishing equipment.
example.tran: 很多海豚因为被渔具缠住而意外死亡。

means.word_mean: 1. an intricate trap that entangles or ensnares its victim

auth_sentence.content: The first possible time of observation is after entanglement.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first possible time of observation is after entanglement.

auth_sentence.content: Entanglement is a lovely principal if you are God.
auth_sentence.res_content: Entanglement is a lovely principal if you are God.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Entanglement is a lovely principal if you are God.

auth_sentence.content: This explains both entanglement and the arrow of time.
auth_sentence.res_content: This explains both entanglement and the arrow of time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This explains both entanglement and the arrow of time.

sentences.en: At dawn we broke through the barbed wire entanglements under the city wall.
sentences.cn: 拂晓我们突破了城墙的铁丝网。

sentences.en: Mr. White threaded his way through the legal entanglements.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生成功地解决了这些法律纠纷。
